## ViewSvc type

View service that the router depends on

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ViewSvc<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = {
    el: ElFactory<TConfig>;
    match: MatchFactory<TConfig['baseElement']>;
    signal: <T>(value: T) => Writable<T>;
    computed: <T>(fn: () => T) => Readable<T>;
};
```
